content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) with a current fuel inventory of 50 coal and an iron plate output of 65. The furnace is currently in a state of NO_INGREDIENTS, indicating it has no items to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has available space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. The furnace at position (1.0, 1.0) was full when trying to insert coal, leading to an error.
